CustomField.description: Checkbox to indicate if Previously assigned approver and the current approver are the same
CustomField.formula: IF ( AND ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( Apttus_Approval__PrevAssignedToName__c ) ) ,Apttus_Approval__PrevAssignedToName__c <> Apttus_Approval__Assigned_To_Link__c ) , true, false)
CustomField.label: Is Previously Assigned Approver Changed?
